name: Picking
objective:
Put one %%icon icon-egg$%% egg which is less than 4
into each %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron

%%icon mdi mdi-information-outline$%% If you want to test the value of an %%icon icon-egg$%% egg which is on the floor, you can use a %%icon icon-direction$%% direction. Your heroes are smart enough to understand that you're talking about the %%icon icon-egg$%% egg.
loss_reason_one_egg_ge_4:
You put an %%icon icon-egg$%% egg greater or equal to 4
in a %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron
